name: Uncatchable Bomber
description:
Controls

- Jump:  W 

- Move player horizontally:  A or Left Arrow - D or Right Arrow

- Fire Bullets: Space or Left Mouse Button

- Eat Corn: E

- Pause Game: P

Credits

- Characters: https://solaarnoble.itch.io/freesat

- Pigeon: https://noktis.itch.io/pigeon

- Background image: https://ansimuz.itch.io/cyberpunk-street-environment

- Explosion Effects: https://limofeus.itch.io/pixel-simulations

- Guns: https://bigmack.itch.io/wwii-mega-gun-pack

- Star Icon: https://narik-the-artist.itch.io/pixel-art-star-animated

- Splash Effect: https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/coloured-paint-stains-collection_938876.htm
